divs: Sighting DetailsI was out at approximately around;1-2-AM.I'm a late night person,Due to the hour I've woked for yrs.So I water the lawn late at night,And always peir up at the stars.In Colorado,You always see somthing moving around,Unexplainable....This particular evening it was summer,a nice clear night,Like a mirror clear.Then something came into view from the west which caught my eye.So I looked over at this lighted item.I looked at it ,again,and more intensly due to it seemed to be coming towards me,And it seemed to be spinning!Well at this time I dropped the hose,Ran into the house and grabbed my camera-This was a digital camera-lumix-12 X zoom-25-mm-wide angled.So when I came back outside...It was still right where I left it.So I set my camera onto night time photo-Started zooming in,And then the object started towards the mountain range.iT WAS STILL OBVIOUSLY HOOVERING!I thought man this has to be a helicopter?But I've seen many helicopters flying around in Colorado Springs....MANY TIMES,At any time of day or night.This was not one of them,nor a plane due to the obvious hoover motion,And it was'nt hoovering like perfect,It was moving like eradicly from side to side,and up and down.So I started snaping the pics,It was closer to the mountain peaks by this time,so I was losing sight.Except for the bright spinning lights.So I snapped one photo after another,And thiese are what I saw when I downloaded them.This was the smallest UFO I've seen in the area.The largest one{ no photo of course}Was around greenland Colorado{between Colo.Spgs.And Denver.Basicly one of the remote highway areas through the front range.This was was city size....Several of us comuters pulled over to see this move over us.Around 11-11:30-pm.Full moon,clear night.The entire object was like a bunring cigar underneath as it moved very quickly over our heads with not one sound...
Summary: From my front yrd.Toward the mountain front range.Which is apprx.8,000-ft elev.&-10-15-mi.from me-
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There was one other sighting in Colorado Springs on or around July 22nd 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
